Ayero sewa giro nung awong atata yero sena, “Ora niye nika niyetope na awe sero nei?” Ayero senu Petoro mene eyero sena, “Ning Kristo, Sorao Emo nanae.”
Ayero senu Yesu awong eno ge tauyao eyero sena, “Ge nana awiya emo zo eno oko sae.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu nung ago magayero nupema iropariniya auna ge sena.
Mt 16:21-28;Lu 9:22-27
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene awong ge tugata yari sero eyero sena, “Na Emora Mani mene yaya-biyaya tamarinena. Yuda emora simaita pirisa babuzeta sao tauyao ge gipao emo amimene na awang sero na daya magayarinena. Magayana be etama aung yai aune na nupema seka yero iroparinena.”
Ge awiya senu kasa yenu gigiwa. Asenu Petoro mene nung yuno baungno awang sero eyero sena, “Ayero oko sase.”

Ayero senu Yesu mene kapetegairo buro-mani nuna ena giro abena Petoro gona yero eyero sena, “Sanda, ning na doro daigai. Ning ge sinesa awiya Tuwa Bayaura ge okowata, emora ge niya.” Ayero sena arauwa.

Yesu mene buro-mani nuna aune emo bauno dubu baina aune awiya yau senu bumuwa eyero sena, “Zo nung na ago yari yero giro aratamao nuna apakana doro dubo minaore yaya tamaore auna i pasao nuna diungno na ago yaise.

Noeno okowata, zo nung tawingna nao nuna sorero puro nari kotumariniya auna nao nuna aung yariniya. Arata zo nung na eno yero o Bowi Iwaing nana eno yero tawingna nao nuna duwariniya amimene nao iwaing tamariniya.
Zo nung tawingna nona iwaing apakana awiya pupunariniya, arata nao nuna aung yariniya, awiya nona nomi nuna-una mitariniye?
Nupema nao nuna kapetegaise kotungno zuma noma pugai aune nao nuna awiya abena kapete nuna-una gariniye? Aung arauwa.

Emo pasena nasani Tuwa Bayau daigati nasani nowa be aune emo zo mene na ta ge nana awiya awang sariniya, awiya na Emora Mani mene Mama nana-una waegaore angelo pewa yetugaore bumarinena be aune na abena emo awiya awang sarinena.” Yesu mene ayero sena arauwa.

Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Emo ena etu dopero miteya amimene oko magayao naya Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna putoung kasa daung yai garineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesura taung mene nona zo ine kasa yena.
Mt 17:1-13;Lu 9:28-36
CHAPTER.VERS: Wari be 6 aung yenu aune Yesu mene Petoro Yakobo aune Yohane awong awiya gege puro diri bainana witiwa Yesura taung mene diti moko nunae-una atu darawa yero benaung zo ewe yena ara.
Mo nuna mene waegairo neyang yena. Mo nuna awiya neyang kaing-kaing yao. Emo zo mene mo sayai ayao ine yao teng oko.
Buro-mani nuna mene Eliyato Mose awongto Yesu aune dema ge sinasani mitiwato awiya gigiwa.
Giro Petoro mene Yesu eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, name etu mitenane awiya iwaing. Arare ning nigasa nae kouboga etama sinarinenane—zo nina, zo Mosera, zo Eliyara.”
Petoro mene no saine nete giro ge awiya sena. Noeno okowata, awong buro-mani mene awang bainakama yewa.
Ayero newa bereze zo mene buro awong worena. Ayero yenu ge zo bereze auna mokora atu eyero kasa yenu nigiwa, “Awiya mani nana. Nung yo diyang nana. Ge nuna nigipu.”
Buro-mani mene ge awiya nigiro gari-gari yero emo zo oko gigiwa, arata Yesu gege mene awong aune dema mitina awiya gigiwa.

Yesu buro-mani nuna aune dema diri atu wosiro bautunasani nung awong eno ge tauyao sinasani eyero sena, “Niye tani gigeya auna ge oko sae. Na Emora Mani mene magayero iropana aune niye ge awiya saya teng yariniya.” Ayero sena ara.
Arare awong Yesura ge tauyao sena awiya dimuwa. Arata awong Yesu magayero iropariniya auna gera susuwa gari sero kotung-katung yewa.
Ayero nasani nung atata yero sewa, “Sao tauyao ge gipao emo mene eyero sinowa, ‘Eliya gitau bai aune Kristo bariniya.’ Nono yero ayero sinowi?”

Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Eliya nung gitau buro tawingna nao meko awiya apakana korayai aune Kristo bariniya. Na Emora Mani eno ge eyero gaewa mitoiya, Nung yaya-biyaya tamariniya. Awong nung pusugairo gero iyarineya. Ge ayero gaewa mitoiya. Arata Eliya mene buro tawingna nao meko apakana kora yati siya, awiya tani nana-una atu kasa yariniya auna ge oko gayateya.
Aeno na niye eno sinena era. Eliya buna. Bunu giro emo ena mene nung eno tani tebe-tabe yewa. Ge nung eno gaewa ayao ine teng yewa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene mani zo iwae nuna-una mitauna awiya kora yena.
Mt 17:14-21;Lu 9:37-43
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong wosiro buro kasa ye buro-mani enana-una yero emo bauno dubu baina mene buro-mani nuna ena aune dema mitiwa gigiwa. Sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena mene buro-mani aune ge betinasani mitiwa.
Ayero newa emo bauno mene Yesu butunenu giro yangka sero sungno baungno arugaiwa ara.
Ayero yewa Yesu mene awong atata yero sena, “Niye ge nomaze awong aune dema sinei?”
Ayero senu emo bauno dubu baina mitiwa auna emo zo mene nung eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, na mani emodi nana puro nina-una bumena. Noeno okowata, iwae nuna-una toiro mitoi nung ge aung mitoiya.

Mani nana be ena iwae mene nung darapunoi zuwero begura suwero di yetinoi taung aingso nuna tau-tataware noiya. Arare na buro-mani nina mene iwae tunaese sesena, arata awong tunao ine teng oko yeteya.” Ayero sena ara.
Ayero senu Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “O niye emo bauno inao aung. Na be nazigo niye aune dema narineni? Na be nazigo buro ninae eno taung dedunasani nari neni? Mani puro nana-una bungpu.”
Ayero senu awong mani puro nuna-una bumuwa iwae mene Yesu giro mani daraunu zuwero begura gutinasani angzi apunenu
Yesu mene maina maung atata yero sena, “Dawang noune yaya ewiya tauni?” Ayero senu abena eyero sena, “Nung mani maingkore tauna.
Arare iwae mene mani magayaise sero nung darapunoi oura ta iyaora zuwero noiya arauwa. Arata ning yaya kora yao ine teng yariniya, awiya ning nae eno yo auno nae soreung.”
Ayero senu giro Yesu mene bera puro eyero sena, “Na yaya awiya kora yao ine teng yarinita, asinesita? Emo zo nung tumo diyaore amimene tani apakana yai teng yariniya.”
Ayero senu maina maung mene mena eyero sena, “Na ning tumo didinona, arata ning na soremasa na ning tumo diro baingtane.” Ayero sena ara.

Arare Yesu mene emo bauno witao nuna-una suno butunewa giro nung iwae tunero eyero sena, “Ning iwae ge aung nao, o dawong itigao, na ning eno ge tauyao sinena era. Ning mani doro nuna-una nupema oko towase.” Ayero sena ara.
Ayero senu iwae mene be kerero mani awiya tau-tataware yao denu angzi apunenu iwae nung dunu mani awiya magayaine yena. Ayero yenu emo bauno witao mene giro eyero sewa, “Mani magayetiya.” Ayero sewa,
arata Yesu mene maina wawong iniro ininu iropuna ara.
Yesu buro-maine dema gare toiro buro-mani mene emo baunona diti pungyero aune nung atata yero sewa, “Nae iwae awiya tunari yetenane nono yero teng oko yao yetiye?”
Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Name iwae ayao awiya tunari sero isa saora buro gege yero tuninonane. Iwae tunaora nagibo zo oko mitiya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu nung ago magayero nupema iropariniya auna ge nupema senu be etobe yena.
Mt 17:22-23;Lu 9:43-45
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong atu iropuro baungno tawing yazo Galilaya awiya buwagaiwa. Arata Yesu mene awong bautu newa awiya emo bauno mene gao awang sena.

Noeno okowata, nung buro-mani nuna gipinasani eyero sena, “Awong na Emora Mani awiya puro emo enana-una waweng pugaya na daya magayarinena. Magayero wari be etama aung yai aune iroparinena.” Ayero sena ara.
Arata awong ge nuna-una susuwa oko gigiwa. Nupema awong nung atata yao awang yewa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Awe mene baina niye?
Mt 18:1-5;Lu 9:46-50
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong bautunete baung Kapaneam yero gare toiro mitiwa aune Yesu mene awong atata yero sena, “Niye nagibe atu ge nono sesei?”
Yesu mene ayero atata yena, arata awong ge abena oko sao yewa. Noeno okowata, awong nagibe atu eyero sewa, “Naname-una zo awe mene baina niye?” Ayero sewa ara.
Arare Yesu mene adungno buro-mani nuna 12 yau senu bumuwa eyero sena, “Emo zo mene gitau yari sariniya, nung amimene ago yaise. Nung emo apakana auna sou yaise.”
Ayero sero aune nung mani maingkoka zo puro pu towang gairo mani saniro awong eno eyero sena,

“Emo zo mene mani zo eyao ine na eno kora yariniya, nung amimene na kora yetiya ayero yariniya. Emo zo na kora yariniya amimene na gege okowata, nung na iyengtinu wosiwang awiya dema kora yetiya ayero yariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
Yohane mene nung eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, nae emo zo nae aune dema oko nao amimene yazo nina yau sinasani iwae tuninenu gigiwangne. Arata nung nae oko ago yao noiya, arare duwaise sewangne.”

Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Buro duwaise awiya oko sae. Noeno okowata, emo zo mene yazo nana yau sinasani tani putoungne zo yariniya amimene mena yazo nana puro wosari yai teng oko yariniya.
Emo iwo name eno oko yariniya awiya otao naname arauwa.
Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Emo zo mene niye Kristora mani yero nowa awiya giro ou minao niye eno pugariniya amimene abena zuma nuna iwaing pumariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Tani meko mene emora tumo diyao noi meko noiya.
Mt 18:6-9;Lu 17:1-2
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene eyero sena, “Zo nung mani mamanikaka na tumo didinowa auna zo yumai pasena tamoiye sero, niye bere-bere daba bainakama zo emo auna dube kimegairo wito kurura musugaya gutai teng yariniya. Noeno okowata, emo amimene pasena oko yaore oura gutero magayariniya, awiya nona eo yao gege. Arata nung pasena yai aune Tuwa Bayau mene abena pugariniya, awiya nona mou-mesa yao.

Ning wawong zo mene pasena yasese yai giro wawong awiya kapase. Ning wawong dekaongkare gege nete ago uritira baungno nasa iwaing yariniya ara. Arata ning wawong etore nete ago soma iyao awao gege awinoiya auna babasa meko yariniya.
[Soma meko auna ipa mene oko maganowa. Soma auna iyao oko wowosinoiya.]

Ning te zo mene pasena yasese yai giro te awiya kapase. Ning te dekaongkare gege nete ago uritira baungno nasa iwaing yariniya ara. Arata ning te etore nete ago soma iyao awao gege awinoiya auna babasa meko yariniya arauwa.
[Soma meko auna ipa mene oko maganowa. Soma auna iyao oko wowosinoiya.]

Ning diti moko zo mene pasena yasese yai giro diti moko awiya zokase. Ning diti moko dekaongkare gege nete ago Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna nape babasa iwaing yariniya ara. Arata ning diti moko etore nete ago soma iyao awao gege awinoiya auna babasa meko yariniya arauwa.
Soma meko auna ipa mene oko maganowa. Soma auna iyao oko wowosinoiya.
Name biyoung puro nona minaora sesinonane iwaing noiya ara. Deka ayero yaya zo iyao ine amimene emo bauno apakana iwaing yaese sesariniya.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene bauno duwaora ge sena.
Mt 19:1-12;Lu 16:18
CHAPTER.VERS: Biyoung awiya nona iwaing. Arata biyoung perusa yariniya, awiya name nono yanane mapu nuna iwaing nupema kasa yariniye? Name biyoung puro nona tame sesinonane iwaing noiya, deka ayero niye dubo-monone naya iwaing yariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.

Yesu buro-mani nuna aune dema atu iropuro baung tawing yazo nuna Yudaya auna yero nupema doro baung tawing zo ou Yodan enabara mitina auna yewa emo bauno dubu baina mene nuna-una nupema kasa yewa nung awong eno uritira ge tugata yero gipero nasani nauna ara.
Anenu Farisayo ena mene nuna-una kasa yero nung gaero gari sero atata yero sewa, “Emo mene bauno nuna duwao awiya teng nita?”
Ayero sewa nung abena eyero sena, “Mose mene sao tauyao ge niye eno pugairo nono seni?”
Ayero senu awong sewa, “Mose mene eyero sena: Emo zo bauno nuna duwari sero yero giro bauno duwaora igi zo gaero aune bauno duwaise. Mose mene ayero sena arauwa.” Ayero sewa ara.
Asewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Ziyo tauyao ninae eno Mose mene ge awiya niye eno gaena.
Arata Tuwa Bayau mene nona apakana tapunasani emore baunone tauna.
Arare emo mene ai maungne nuna doro bauno nuna aune dema gauno baingtiro
awongto dubore taungne dekaongka yero narineyato. Arare awongto etobe okowata, dekaongka yero narineyato.
Tuwa Bayau mene awongto tairo pugainu atiwato, arare emo mene oko kapaese.” Yesu mene ayero sena arauwa.
Awong gare toiro mitiwa aune buro-mani nuna mene gera susuwa gari sero nung atata yewa.
Atata yewa giro nung awong eno eyero sena, “Emo zo mene aro nuna doro bauno seka atariniya, awiya nung kuma yariniya.
Ora bauno zo mene yu nuna doro emo zo atariniya, awiya nung kuma yariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Mt 19:13-15;Lu 18:15-17
CHAPTER.VERS: Emo bauno ena mene mani mamanikaka Yesu mene iniro gao yaise sero nuna-una puro butunewa buro-mani nuna mene emo bauno awang sewa.
Ayero sewa Yesu mene giginu meko yenu giro buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Niye mani mamanikaka dopu nana-una bae. Nagibo nunae oko gazae. Awong ayao amimene Tuwa Bayaura napo auna gerao.
Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Zo nung tumo diyao nuna mani mamanikakara ine oko amimene Tuwa Bayaura-una nape babao ine teng oko.”
Yesu mene ge ayero sero mani mamanikaka puro saniro wawong nunae-una ziye pugairo gao yena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Emo wau monine auna ge.
Mt 19:16-30;Lu 18:18-30
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene babari sero nenu emo zo sungno buro kasa ye nuna-una gairo koing gairo eyero sena, “O gipao emo iwaing, na nono yero nao me iwaing tamarineni?”
Ayero senu Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Ning na iwaing asinasani iwaingna susuwa gosinesita? Tuwa Bayau nung nata iwaing.

Ning Tuwa Bayaura sao tauyao ge gosinosa erauwa: ‘Emo oko dasa magayae; kuma oko yase; ning ugaing oko yase; ning emo zo gera pugari ge iwao ge oko sase; emo zora nona ge iwero sero oko pumase; ai maung nina-una ge dimase.’ Sao tauyao ge ayao mitiya.”
Ayero senu nung eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, na sema nana naungwa be aune ge awiya apakana diungno butunawe emo yetena.”

Ayero senu Yesu diti yero nung gosinasani yo auno giro nung eno eyero sena, “Ning buro zo duwasa mitoiya awiya ye. Ning buro ewiya yero aune nao me iwaing tamarinesa. Ning baungno nona nina apakana pugasa emo ena mene zuma gaero pumaya aune wau moni nina awiya emo bauno bogamasa eno bono yasa pumae. Ayero yasa wau nina uritira atu mitariniya ara. Ayero yero aune buro na ago yase.”
Yesu mene ayero senu nung tumo koina-kaina yero kotung-katung nasani doro baungna. Awiya noeno okowata, wau moni nuna witao.
Arare Yesu mene diti-dati yero buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Emo wau moni witaore amimene Tuwa Bayaura napo auna babaora buro bainakama yarineya.”
Ayero senu buro-mani ge awiya nigiro wawong di gamuwa. Arata Yesu awong eno eyero nupema sena, “O buro-mani nana, Tuwa Bayaura nape babao awiya buro bainakama.
Wo kamel mene zai totora towao awiya teng oko. Deka ayero emo wau moni witaore mene Tuwa Bayaura napo auna babao awiya deka teng oko.”
Ayero senu awong wawong di gauno wina-se yewa, “Arare awe mene uritira baungno nao me iwaing tamao teng niye?”

Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene diti nunae-una yero eyero sena, “Emo mene ayero yao ine teng oko, arata Tuwa Bayau mene ayero yao awiya teng niya. Noeno okowata, Tuwa Bayau mene tani apakana yao teng niya.” Ayero sena ara.
Ayero senu giro Petoro mene nung eno eyero sena, “Sana nigi. Nae nona nanae apakana doro nina ame nasani nonane.”

Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Emo zo mene napo nuna ta metamani nuna ta numono mani nuna ta ai nuna ta maung nuna ta mani awiso nuna ta tawing nuna awiya na enota Bowi Iwaing eno duwariniya, awiya

nung amimene napore metamaine numono mani ai amono mani awisore tawingne awiya 100 be yeme eune tamariniya. Ayero nai emo bauno ena mene nung mani nana asero nung gera gaira yero narineya. Ago nung nao me iwaing awiya pumariniya.
Ora emo gitau neya auna daigairo mene ago yarineya. Emo ago neya amimene gitau yarineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu nung magayero iropariniya auna ge nupema senu be etama yena.
Mt 20:17-19;Lu 18:31-34
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu emo enane Yerusalem babari sero nagibe atu bautunewa Yesu nung gitau nenu buro-mani nuna mene ago atu kotung-katung nasani bautunewa emo bauno ena awong ago newa adeka dema awang nasani aune bamuwa ara. Ayero bautunewa Yesu mene buro-mani nuna 12 puro tani emo mene ago nung eno yarineya auna ge awong eno keregati nasani eyero sena,

“Sana nigipu. Name Yerusalem nape babari sero wiwitinenane. Witiro atu kasa yero nanane aune emo zo mene na Emora Mani awiya puro pirisa babuzera-una ta sao tauyao ge gipao emo auna waweng pugai awong na daya magayanese sero emo Yuda okora-una waweng pugarineya.
Ayero pugaya emo Yuda oko mene na isipu nasani begura na eno pisero waung mene na yana-kana dero aune daya magayarinena. Magayana wari be etama aung yai aune nupema iroparinena.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yakoboto Yohane awongto baina yero mitari sewato.
CHAPTER.VERS: Zebedira mani etobe Yakoboto Yohane, awongto amimene Yesura-una buro eyero sewato, “Gipao emo, ning nato eno nona zo yasese kotupunenato.”
Ayero sewato giro abena eyero sena, “Na nomaze nito eno yanese kotupuneito?”

Ayero senu awongto sewato, “Ning waegaore mitarinesa be aune nato deungbe nina-una adungno mitarinenato, zo wawong mera, zo wawong mepora, + 10:37 Soremao GeMatiu 20:21 auna atu mitiya awiya gi. awiya nigasese sinenato.”

Ayero sewato nung abena ge pungyao awongto eno sena, “Nito nonana susuwa oko gao yero na atata yeteyato. Na ou dokowang yao zo minarinena, awiya nito minao teng yarineitota? Na ou suwao zo pumarinena, awiya nito pumao teng yarineitota?”

Ayero senu awongto eyero sewato, “Nato teng yarinenato.” Ayero sewato giro nung eyero sena, “Na ou dokowang yao zo minarinena, awiya nito dema minarineyato. Na ou suwao zo parinena, awiya nito dema parineyato. + 10:39 Ou dokowang yao auna susuwa eyao era. Iwo mene Yesu eno yaya pugarineya deka ayero mani etobe eno yaya pugarineya. Nupema ou suwao auna susuwa eyao era. Ou baina buro tawing topetiro aung yero noiya, deka ayero yaya mene Yesu topetiro puro wosariniya.

Arata nito wawong nana mera, ta wawong nana mepora adungno mitarineyato auna ge awiya nane sao ine teng oko. Tuwa Bayau mene masi awiya emo ena eno kora yenu mitoiya. Arare awong amimene masi auna atu adungno mitarineya.” Ayero sena ara.
Buro-mani 10 mene ge awiya nigiro Yakoboto Yohane eno dubo mou yewa.

Ayero yewa giro Yesu mene buro-mani 12 yau senu bumuwa eyero sena, “Tawingna emo tuwa mene emo bauno awong sou yaese sinowa. Nupema emo babuze mene emo bauno puro wosiro awong witao nunae ine yero nowa, awiya gosinowa.
Arata ninae mene zo ayero oko yae. Ninae-una zo mene baina ninae yari yero giro enana soremao yero naise.
Gitau yao ninae yari yero giro enana soumani yero naise.
Noeno okowata, na Emora Mani mene emo na sou yaese okowata, na natope sou buro nasani magayero emo bauno witao mekora atu sorero pumari bumuwang.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene emo diti guma yao zo kora yena.
Mt 20:29-34;Lu 18:35-43
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu buro-mani nuna aune baungno kasa ye Yeriko nape gairo napo awiya duwari sero emo bauno dubu baina aune dema bautu newa emo diti guma yao zo yazo nuna Batimea, nung Timeara mani, amimene nagibo deungbera atu adungno mitina ara. Nung moni eno isa sinauna.
Arare nung atu mitasani Yesu Nasaretera emo etu butuniya auna ge nigiro nung arugairo sena, “O Yesu, ning Dawidira sai, ning na eno yo aung.”
Ayero senu emo witao mene nung gona yero sewa, “Ning ge do.” Ayero sewa, arata nung nupema wawa baina sena, “O Dawidira sai, ning na eno yo aung.”
Ayero senu giro Yesu mene dopero eyero sena, “Yau sepu bae.” Ayero senu awong emo diti guma yao awiya yau sero sewa, “Awang oko yase. Iropuro dope. Nung ning yau siniya.”
Ayero sewa nung mo wape nuna kougairo mena dopero kasa ye Yesura-una yenu
Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Na nomaze ning eno yanese sinesi?” Ayero senu emo diti guma yao amimene eyero sena, “Gipao emo, diti moko nana iwaing yaise sinena.”
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu nung emo tuwa zo ine yero Yerusalem witina.
Mt 21:1-11;Lu 19:28-40;Yo 12:12-19
CHAPTER.VERS: Ayero senu Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Ning baung. Tumo diyao nina-una teng ning iwaing nesa.” Ayero senu diti moko nuna iwaing yenu nung Yesu nagibe atu ago yero baungna arauwa.

Awong napo Yerusalem nugu kasa yewa. Napo maingkoka etobe yazo nunato Betefasito Betani atu mitauwato ara. Atu kasa yero diri yazo nuna Oliwa awiya zorogairo Yesu mene buro-mani etobe gitau babaetose sero awongto eno eyero sena,
“Nito buwagairo napo nugu mitiya auna baungputo. Baungno atu kasa yero wo dongki auna mani zo kimegeya mitiya awiya tamarineyato ara. Emo zo za wo auna tame oko adumao. Wo awiya besero puro bungputo.
Anayato emo zo mene, ‘Nito no yari wo awiya besineito?’ ayero sariniya, awiya nito nung eno eyero seputo: ‘Tuwara buro euna mitiya. Nung etu mena nupema pugariniya.’ Ayero seputo.”
Yesu mene ayero senu awongto baungno wo dongkira mani awiya tamuwato. Wo awiya emo mene garo bera atu kimegaiwa nagibo nugu atu mitina awiya taungno besewato ara.
Angsi besinewato emo ena atu mitiwa amimene awongto eno eyero sewa, “Nito no yari buro wora angsi besineito?”
Ayero sewa giro awongto ge Yesu mene saetose sena awiya sewato giro duwa.
Ayero yewa awongto wo awiya puro baung Yesura-una yewato awong mo nunae wo tame atu zuwewa Yesu mene wo tame witiro aduna.
Ayero yenu emo witao mene taung wori nunae puro nagibe atu ero zuwewa. Ena mene i bure baungno i bowang kapero puro buro nagibe atu pugairo pugairo bamuwa ara.
Arare emo gitau bautu newa aune emo ago butunewa amimene arero sewa, “Emo Tuwara bera butuniya nung awiya bowi yanene.
Tuwa yero naora be nuna kasa yariniya, arare nung bowi yanene. Ewowo naname Dawidi auna emo tuwa yaora be awiya nune nupema tamariniya. Oro, oro, Tuwa Bayau eno sanene.” Ayero sewa ara.
Yesu mene Yerusalem kasa yero Tuwa Bayaura ibu baina auna toiro nona apakana awiya gigina. Gosinenu ture itinenu giro nung napo awiya doro buro-mani nuna 12 aune dema napo Betani auna bamuwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene i fik awiya me iyao awang sero waru ge sena.
CHAPTER.VERS: Iya gainu awong napo Betani awiya doro bautu newa Yesu nung meri auno giro
i zo yazo nuna fik awiya gire ake atu giro nung me ena mitita asero gari baungna ara. Baungno i auna nugu kasa yero me aung gi gege gigina. Awiya noeno okowata, me iyaora be aung.
Arare Yesu mene i aeno waru ge eyero sena, “Emo zo mene me nina oko minariniya.” Ayero senu buro-mani nuna mene ge awiya nigiwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana atu emo nona wina-piti newa awiya tunena.
Mt 21:12-17;Lu 19:45-48;Yo 2:13-22
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong kasa ye Yerusalem gaiwa Yesu nung ibu bainana toiro emo ibu mokora atu nona wina-piti newa awiya dero awang sero tunena ara. Ayero nasani nung emo moni wina-piti newa auna tewo awiya ininu kapetegainu emo ni gumo pugao emo auna adumao masi dema kapetegaina ara.
Ayero yero awong nona diungno ibu baina auna puma-sauma yao awang sena.

Nung awong eno eyero sena, “Ge gayao zo eyero mitiya era, ‘Ibu nana awiya tawing sero sero auna emo bauno mene isa saora ibu mitaise.’ Ge gayao ayero mitiya, arata niye yeteya ibu awiya ugaing yao emora pungyao masi ine niya.” Ayero sena ara.
Ayero senu emo bauno apakana amimene Yesura ge nigiro wawong di gamuwa. Ayero yewa pirisa babuzere sao tauyao ge gipao emo mene ge awiya nigiro Yesu awang yero nung dari sero nagibo tamari yewa ara.
Ture itinenu Yesu buro-mani nuna aune awong Yerusalem doro bamuwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Emo tumo diyaore mene isa sero nona pumariniya.
CHAPTER.VERS: Iya gainu awong angyero i fik auna nugu baungno i irara yena awiya gigiwa. Tatai nuna aune dema irara yena.
Ayenu Petoro mene i awiya giro kotungno Yesu eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, ewiya gi. Nine i fik zo waru yetesa amimene irara yetiya.”
Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Niye Tuwa Bayau tumo dipu.

Na ge me eyero sinena era. Emo zo mene diri ewiya eno eyero sariniya, ‘Ning nitope iropuro baungno witora gute.’ Nung ayero sariniya, awiya tani deka ayao ine kasa yariniya. Arata emo amimene dubo eto yariniya, awiya tani awiya oko kasa yariniya. Nung, ‘Ge diri eno sesena awiya me yariniya,’ asero nariniya, awiya tani awiya kasa yariniya.
Arare na niye eno eyero sinena era. Niye nona zo pumari sero giro isa sarineya be aune niye eyero kotungpu: Tuwa Bayau mene nona awiya nae eno pugariniya. Ayero kotumarineya, awiya nona pumarineya.
Ora niye isa sari sero yero giro dopero aune emo zo eno dubo mou puro nete giro mouyao awiya disepu. Mama naname uritira mitoiya amimene pasena ninae dema disaise sero niye emora pasena awiya disepu.
[Arata niye emo zora pasena oko disao yarineya, awiya Mama nana uritira mitoiya amimene pasena ninae dema oko disariniya.”] Yesu mene ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Awe mene putoung Yesu eno pugaini, awiya nigari sero nung atata yewa.
Mt 21:23-27;Lu 20:1-8
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong nupema tera kapete gairo baungno Yerusalem kasa yewa. Atu kasa yewa Yesu mene ibu bainana atu ang nenu pirisa babuze ta sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena ta simai ena amimene nuna-una kasa yero
nung eno eyero sewa, “Ning nae eno se. Ning ana bera tani awiya yero nosi? Awe senu tani awiya yero nosi?”
Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Na niye eno atata zo yarinena. Niye abena na eno sarineya, awiya nane deka ayero ana bera tani awiya yero nona auna susuwa sarinena.
Yohane ge ou zayero suwao emo amimene buro nuna awiya ana bera yero nauni—emora bera ta Tuwa Bayaura bera i? Ge sepu nigane.”
Ayero senu awong nuka nuyetope ge wina-se nasani eyero sewa, “Nae Yohanena ge ou suwao awiya uritira nona asarinenane, awiya nung eyero sariniya, ‘Arare niye nono yero ge nuna oko nigao yewi?’

Arata name eyero sarinenineta? ‘Yohanena ge ou suwao awiya emora nona.’ Ayero sarinenineta?” Ayero wina-se yewa ara. Awiya noeno okowata, emo bauno apakana mene Yohane gosinauwa nung porofete me yero nauna, arare awong emo bauno awang nasani
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Emo memeko-mameko wain buro diya yero nauwa auna ge eniya.
Mt 21:33-46;Lu 20:9-19
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu eno eyero sewa, “Nae oko gao yero nenane.” Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Arare na ana bera tani awiya yero nona auna susuwa awiya niye eno oko keregarinena.” Ayero sena arauwa.

Yesu mene ge eniya ena sero awong eno eyero sena, “Emo zo mene wain urero goma gaero wain buro diya yao emo auna garo yena ara. Ayero yero nung wain me mozaora kote baina zo wauna. Ayero yero aune nung emo ena eno eyero sena, ‘Na tawing zora babarinena, arare niye buro nana diya yepu. Diya yarineya, awiya na me nuna ena niye eno pugarinena.’ Ayero sero nung doro tawing zo omete oko auna baungna.
Arare wain me paora be bunu giro buro maung mene buro-mani zo buro nuna diya yero nauwa auna-una baungno wain me ena pumaise sero iyengtinu baungna.
Baungno kasa yenu awong nung puro waung mene dero awang sewa nona aung wawong usa yero baungna.
Ayero yenu giro buro maung mene nupema buro-mani zo nunae-una babaise sero iyengtinu baungnu awong nung puro giro sero gero iro ziye atu dewa bozo yena ara.

Ayero yewa giro buro maung mene nupema buro-mani zo iyengtinu baungnu awong nung dewa magayena ara. Tani ayao gege nasani nauwa. Nung buro-mani witao pugatinaunu bautunauwa awong buro-mani ena waung mene dero buro-mani ena dero nauwa magayero nauwa.

Ayero nawe duwa emo dekaongka gege nung buro maung aune mitauna. Nung mani emodi nuna. Nung awiya yo dingya nuna. Arare nung mani nuna nunae-una babaise sero eyero kotungna, ‘Awong mani nana-una ge oko darineya.’ Ayero kotungno iyengtinu baungna ara.

Arata buro diya yao emo mene nuka nuyetope wina-se yero eyero sewa, ‘Mani euna maung magayai aune nung maungna tawing ewiya pumariniya. Nung danane magayai aune tawing nuna ewiya tawing naname yariniya ara. Bungpu.’
Ayero sero awong nung saniro dewa magayenu aingso nuna puro wain buro doro au goma bautara gaiwa ara.
Ayero yewa, arare wain buro maung mene nono yariniye? Nung buro diya yao emo awiya dai magayaya aune emo ena mene tawing nuna diya yaese sariniya ara.
Niye Tuwa Bayaura ge ewiya gitau zazagaiwita? Garo yao emo mene daba zo gigiwa meko yenu duwa. Arata daba amimene garo autura ziwong yero mitoiya.
Nona awiya Tuwara bera kasa yena. Naname gigenane iwaing niya. Niye ge awiya gitau zazagaiwita?” Ayero sena ara.
Awong Yesura ge nigiro nung ge eniya awiya awong eno sena awiya giro nung gera pugari sewa, arata awong emo bauno dubu baina atu mitiwa awiya awang yero giro Yesu doro bamuwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Takis moni Sisa eno pugao auna Yesu atata yewa.
Mt 22:15-22;Lu 20:20-26
CHAPTER.VERS: Yuda emora gitau yao ena mene Farisayo ena aune Herodera Pati memba ena aune awong awiya Yesura-una iyengtiwa bamuwa ara. Awiya Yesura ge zo puro nung gera pugari sero bamuwa.

Awong baungno ge nung eno eyero sewa, “Gipao emo, ning ge me gege sinosa awiya gosinenane. Ning emo zo oko awang nosa. Ning emo witaore emo wosaore apakana gosinosa ziyo gomi dekaongka gege noiya. Ning ge me sinasani Tuwa Bayaura nagibo gipinosa. Arare name Yuda emo mene takis moni Roma emora emo tuwa Sisa aeno pugatinonane, awiya ning gosinosa teng noita aung i?
Name takis moni pugari nenineta duwari nenine?” Ayero sewa ara. Arata Yesu nung awong iwora yani itari sero newa awiya giro eyero sena,

“Niye noeno na gaero gari sero nei? Moni zo pugaipu bai gane.” Ayero senu awong moni zo pugaiwa puro eyero sena, “Ititire owere monina mitiya ewiya ana i?” Ayero senu awong eyero sewa, “Awiya Sisara.”

Ayero sewa nung awong eno eyero sena, “Niye nona Sisara asero giro Sisa eno pugaipu. Ora nona Tuwa Bayaura asero giro Tuwa Bayau eno pugaipu.” Ayero senu awong ge awiya nigiro wawong di gamuwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Awong emo magayero iroparineya auna Yesu atata yewa.
Mt 22:23-33;Lu 20:27-40
CHAPTER.VERS: Sadukayo emo mene eyero sinauwa, “Mamagayao awong nupema oko iroparineya.” Arare Sadukayo ena mene Yesura-una buro nung gaero gari sero eyero atata yero sewa,

“Gipao emo, Mose mene name eno eyero sero gaena: Emo zora tato magayai aro nuna mani aung mitariniya, awiya emo amimene tato nuna-una aro noi awiya atiro mani tato nuna eno pumaise. Mose mene ayero gaena ara.
Arare gitau metato 7 mitauwa. Tato kiyongne amimene bauno atiro mani oko pumao magayena.
Ayero yenu meta nuna nung tamaira amimene bauno deka awiya atiro mani oko pumao magayena. Ayero yenu nupema nung tamaira deka ayero yena.
Ayero yero metato 7 apakana bauno awiya atiro mani oko pumao magayewa. Ago bauno awiya magayena.
Metato 7 mene nung atiro nasani nauwa, arare mamagayao iroparineya be aune bauno awiya ana yariniye?”
Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Niye Tuwa Bayaura ge gayaore Tuwa Bayaura putoungne awiya oko gao, arare niye ge me wosopatiro nowa.
Magayao mene iropuro nupema oko wina-ati yarineya. Awong uritira angelo ine yero narineya.

Niye mamagayao iroparineita asero atata neya, arata niye ge Mose mene gaena awiya zazagatinowita? Nung i motu zora atu iyao awinenu gigina. Arata iyao mene i motu awiya oko awero aung yao yena auna ungwe awiya gaitinete aune ge zo Tuwa Bayau mene nung eno sena awiya eyero gaena, ‘Na Abrahamto Isaka aune Yakobo auna Tuwa yero mitona.’ Niye ge awiya zazagatinowita?

Tuwa Bayau nung emo mamagayao asinonane awiya gosinoi seka gege yero nowa. Arare nung emo magayaora Tuwa okowata, nung emo seka mitowa auna Tuwa yero mitoiya. Mamagayao iroparineya auna susuwa wosopatiro baingtitinowa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Sao tauyao ge nomi gitau yao niye?
Mt 22:34-40;Lu 10:25-28
CHAPTER.VERS: Sao tauyao ge gipao emo zo mene kasa yero awong ge wina-se newa ge awiya nigina. Yesu mene awong eno ge iwaing wina-se nenu giro nung Yesu atata yero sena, “Sao tauyao ge nomi gitau yao niye?”
Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Sao tauyao ge gitau yao awiya eyao mitiya, O Isreli emo, ge ewiya nigipu. Baina naname nung Tuwa Bayau. Nung nata Tuwa naname.
Ara tamao nina bainakama awiya Tuwa Bayau nina auna-una mitaise. Ayero nasani dubore ititire kotumaore putoungne nina mene nung sou ye.

Sao tauyao ge auna wese awiya eyao era, Ning nika nitope aratapunosa, deka ayero emo ena aratamase. Sao tauyao ge etobe amimene gege baina neyato. Sao tauyao ge eyao ine zo oko mitiya.” Ayero sena ara.
Ayero senu sao tauyao ge gipao emo amimene Yesu eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, me sinesa. Tuwa Bayau dekaongka gege mitiya. Tuwa zo aung awiya me sesesa.

Arata dubore kotumaore mene Tuwa Bayau aratamao ta naka nametope aratapunonane deka ayero emo ena aratamao, awiya tani etobe iwaing ara. Arata tani nona Tuwa Bayau eno pugari sero iyaora pugao awao ta tani wo Tuwa Bayau eno pugari sero dao magayao, awiya tani etobe iwaing maingkoka gege.” Ayero sena ara.
Ayero senu Yesu mene ge nuna niginu iwaing yenu giro nung emo kotumaore giro nung eno eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayau mene beba Tuwa nina niya.” Ayero senu emo bauno apakana Yesu atata yao awang yewa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene awong Kristora susuwa gaese sero atata yena.
Mt 22:41-46;Lu 20:41-44
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana toiro awong eno ge tugata nasani eyero sena, “Sao tauyao ge gipao emo mene eyero sinowa, ‘Yuda emora Sorao Emo yazo nuna Kristo, nung amimene Dawidira sai.’ Nono yero ayero sinowi?

Oweno mene kotumao Dawidi eno pugainu Dawidi nung nuka nune eyero sena, Tuwa Bayau mene Tuwa nana eno eyero sena, ‘Ning wawong me nana-una adungno mitasa na iwo dubu nina awiya benaung nina-una pugana gona yarinesa.’ Tuwa Bayau mene Tuwa nana eno ayero sena ara. Dawidi ayero sena ara.” Yesu mene ayero sero susuuno eyero sena,
“Dawidi mene ge ayero sinasani Kristo eno‘ Tuwa nana’ asena. Arare Kristo nung nono yero Dawidira sai yariniye?” Yesu ayero senu emo dubu bainane mene ge nuna nigiro yawa yawa yewa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Sao tauyao ge gipao emora tani.
Mt 23:1-36;Lu 11:37-54; 20:45-47
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene ge tugata nasani eyero sena, “Niye sao tauyao ge gipao emo awiya umo yepu. Awong taung wori imokakaung wosogairo ang naya emo bauno mene awong kakame atu giro bowi yaese aratapunowa.
Nupema awong yere ibura atu emo baunona benaungna adumari aratapunowa. Nupema awong ana-bonene yaora bera atu masi yazore auna adumari aratapunowa.

Awong bauno yu mamaga yetugao awiya etegairo wau moni nunae pupunowa. Ayero nasani awong pasena nunae worero mani me sao yero nasani isa imoko-kaungkaung sinowa. Emo amimene abena nunae mou-mesayao tamarineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Bauno bogamasa mene Tuwa Bayau eno moni pugaina.
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana toiro adungno emo bauno moni kolektara pugatinewa awiya gigina. Emo waure daigairo mene wau witao pugatinewa
bauno bogamasa zo yu magayao amimene buro toya etobe pugaina ara.

Ayero yenu giro Yesu mene buro-mani nuna yau senu bumuwa eyero sena, “Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Bauno zo yu magayao wau moni aung amimene moni pugaiya awiya emo apakana moni Tuwa Bayau eno pugatineya auna moni awiya daigatiniya.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene Tuwa Bayaura ibu baina meko yariniya ayero sena.
Mt 24:1-2;Lu 21:5-6
CHAPTER.VERS: Noeno okowata, awong awiya moni witao mitiya, arata awong ena gege Tuwa Bayau eno pugeya. Arata bauno ewiya moni nuna maingkoka mitiya auna teng pugairo aung yetiya. Arare nung nona zuma gaero minaora zo oko mitiya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
Yesu buro-maine dema ibu baina doro kasa ye daung gatinewa buro-mani zo mene nung eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, ibura daba babuze awiya gi. Ibu iwaing-kawaing ara.”
Ayero senu Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Ning ibu iwaing gosinesa. Arata ago ibura daba zo oko duwaya zora-una tame mitariniya. Emo mene ago ibura daba apakana kasarineya.” Ayero sena ara.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Mt 24:3-14;Lu 21:7-19
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene diri yazo Oliwa auna witiro adungno ibu baina awiya anuwing nasani mitinu Petoroto Yakobo aune Yohaneto Anderea awong amimene nata nung aune dema mitasani giro nung atata yero sewa,
“Gire, tani awiya be nazi kasa yariniye? Ora nae tani no saore giro susuwa auna me kasa yariniya awiya garinenine?”
Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Emo zo mene niye etegoiye sero, niye giro baingtipu.
Emo witao mene buro ge iwi nasani eyero sarineya, ‘Na Kristo.’ Ayero sinasani awong emo bauno witao etegarineya.

Niye winade-wanade nugu mitarineya arita winade-wanade ake-akemo mitariniya auna bowi nigiro awang oko yae. Winade-wanade kasa yariniya, arata kasa yaya tawingna be oko mena besugariniya. Ago tani ena susuuno kasa yariniya.

Dubu zo mene iropuro dubu zore dema winade-wanade yarineya. Emo tuwa enana dubu mene iropuro emo tuwa enana dubu aune winade-wanade yarineya. Soma enana atu dumi babuze ipariniya. Nupema dora botiyo babuze kasa yerota kasa yero ayariniya. Bauno mani pumari yero nowa auna yaya bere maingkoka zayero noiya. Arata ago awiya bainakama kasa yero noiya. Ayao ine yaya sesena awiya kasa yai aune yaya bainakama ago kasa yariniya, awiya garineya.

Arata niye nika niyetope giro baingtipu. Awong niye puro gera pugarineya. Awong niye yere ibu mokora atu waung mene darineya. Niye buro-mani nana yero nowa, aeno awong niye puro emo babuzere emo tuwa ena auna-una pugaya doparineya ara. Dopero ge me awong eno sarineya.
Bowi Iwaing tawing sero gitau babai aune tani awiya ago kasa yariniya.
Emo mene niye saniro puro gera pugaya be aune niye no sari yero kotung-katung oko yae. Niye gera pugaya be aune ge Tuwa Bayau mene niye eno pugao awiya sepu. Ninae okowata, Oweno mene ge sariniya.

Tatomani ena mene metamani nunae magayaese sero iwora waweng pugarineya. Mamono ena mene mani awiso nunae magayaese sero iwora waweng pugarineya. Mani awiso ena mene iropuro ai amono mamono iwo nasani magayaese sero iwora waweng pugarineya.

Niye dubu nana yero nowa awiya emo bauno apakana gosinowa aeno awong tini kapao niye eno pumarineya. Arata zo nung tau yero dopero nete magayariniya, nung awiya Tuwa Bayau mene sorero pumariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Sisigaora nona meko amimene kasa yariniya.
Mt 24:15-28;Lu 21:20-24
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene ayero sero sena, “Sisigaora nona meko amimene masi nung mitaine teng oko auna atu dopariniya awiya garineya. Be aune awong Yudaya tawingna mitarineya amimene iwo awong doiye sero sungno baung diri yaese. (Emo ge gayao ewiya zazagatinoiya amimene gera susuwa awiya gaise.)
Be aune zo nung garo nuna-una opesara atu mitariniya amimene nona-owi nuna gare mitiya awiya pumari oko towaise. Nung iwo mene doiye sero sungno baung diri yaise.
Be aune zo nung bure atu nariniya amimene taung wori nuna pumari sero oko kapetegairo nape babaise. Nung dema iwo mene doiye sero sungno baung diri yaise.
Oiye, bauno mesare aune bauno mani wuire. Awong yanakana sumaine yao teng oko, arare na awong eno yo apunena.
Tani awiya wa wosaora be nai aune kasa yai wa mene niye gazao eno, niye isa sepu.
Noeno okowata, be auna atu mouyao bainakama kasa yariniya ara. Tuwa Bayau mene tawing yena atu zayero butunawe duwa atu mouyao zo ayao ine oko kasa yena. Nupema ago zo ayao ine oko kasa yariniya ara.
Arare Tuwa mene be awiya oko kapao yatiya, awiya emo bauno apakana sisigairo aung yateya. Arata nung gegeregao dubu nuna eno kotungno aeno be awiya kapena, arare apungka yariniya ara.
Arare be aune emo zo mene niye eno eyero sai oko nigae, ‘Era, Sorao Emo naname ara.’ Nupema, ‘Sorao Emo naname ora.’ Ge ayero sero buro baungno ayaya oko nigae.

Be auna atu Sorao Emo etegao enane porofete etegao enane amimene kasa yarineya. Kasa yero emo baunona dubo sisigari sero tani putoungne ena aune tani benaung sekawa witao awiya yarineya. Ayero nasani Tuwa Bayaura gegeregao dubu auna dubo dema sisigari sero buro baina yarineya ara. Arata awong Tuwa Bayaura gegeregao dubu auna dubo sisigao teng oko, arare yero tetere yarineya ara.
Arata niye nika niyetope umo yepu. Na tani ago kasa yariniya auna ge bere-bere eune niye eno keregatinena.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Ago Emora Mani bariniya.
Mt 24:29-31;Lu 21:25-28
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene ayero sero aune eyero sena, “Yaya tamaora be awiya aung yai aune wari mume yariniya. Ayero yai inona waegao awiya dema aung yariniya.
Ayero nai aune putoung uritira mitowa amimene iparineya. Ayero yai arasa mene uritira atu zokero wosarineya.
Tani ayero kasa yai aune na Emora Mani mene putoung tauyaore waegaore berezera atu wosiro butunana emo bauno mene garineya ara.

Na wosiro angelo iyengtiro emo bauno dubu Tuwa Bayau mene nuna yaese gegeregaina awiya puro pu dekaongna gaese sarinena. Arare angelo mene baungno tawing ageware ageware ikata enaka auna gegeregao dubu nana pumarineya ara.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: I fik mene tani kasa yaora be auna susuwa gipai gaese sena.
Mt 24:32-35;Lu 21:29-33
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene ayero sero aune eyero sena, “Niye i yazo fik auna tani awiya kotungno aune susuwa zo gipu. Bowang nuna botu kasa yero dang iwaing ditinowa be aune niye giro, ‘O, warira be kasa yariniya,’ ayero sinowa.
Arare nona awiya apakana kasa yero aung yai giro eyero sepu, ‘Nung nugu yetiya. Towao bera bautara dodopiniya.’
Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Emo bauno yeme tawingna etu neya amimene oko magayero aung yao naya aune nona awiya apakana kasa yariniya.
Ago uritire tawingne aung yarineyato, arata ge nana mene zo oko aung yariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Emo zo mene be awiya oko gosiniya.
Mt 24:36-44;Lu 17:26-30, 34-36
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu mene ayero sero aune eyero sena, “Tani awiya kasa yaora be nuna awiya emo zo za oko gosineya. Angelo uritira nowa adeka dema be awiya oko gosineya. Na Tuwa Bayaura Mani mene dema be awiya oko gosinena. Mama nana mene gege nata gosinoiya ara.
Niye umo nasani neupu. Be nazi tani awiya kasa yariniye, awiya niye oko gosineya. Arare umo yero baingtipu.

Susuwa nuna eyero mitiya. Emo zo mene tawing ake-kake auna babari sero giro buro-mani nuna awong nona apakana diya yaese sero burora pugaina. Zo buro zora pugairo zo buro zora pugairo ayero yena ara. Ayero nasani garo be diya yao mani mene umo yero baingtaise sero garo doro baungna.
Arare be nazi garora maung mene kapete gariniye—ture itinai auneta, ping tuno-tanota, kokora ge sinai auneta, nupema iya gaora i? Awiya niye oko gosineya, arare niye umo yero baingtiti nasani neupu.
Nung mena kapetegairo niye auriti awinasani mitaya tamoiye sero niye umo yero baingtiti nasani neupu.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Emo gitau yao awong Yesu daya magayaise ge sewa.
Mt 26:1-5;Lu 22:1-2;Yo 11:45-53
CHAPTER.VERS: Na ge niye eno gege okowata, emo bauno apakana aeno sinena. Niye umo yero baingtiti nasani neupu.” Yesu mene ayero sena arauwa.

Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna bonene minaora be kasa nenu be zo ame yis aung auna bonene minaora be awiro nupema awiro kasa yari nenu giro pirisa babuze aune sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena aune awong amimene Yesu etegairo saniro daya magayaise sero nagibo tamari yewa.
Awong eyero sewa, “Emo bauno name dao eno, name oregao be baina auna atu oko yarinenane.” Ayero sewa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Bauno zo mene ou sereyao awiya Yesura ziye atu yasagaina.
Mt 26:6-13;Yo 12:1-8
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu buro-mani nuna aune napo Betani atu baungno emo zo yazo nuna Simon Bozo Tauyaore auna gare atu nona mininasani mitiwa bauno zo garewa daba yazo nuna alabasta amimene yao awiya puro nuna-una buna. Ou zo yazo nuna nad, sere nuna iwaing, awiya garewa mokora mitina. Zuma nuna baina. Arare bauno amimene kasa yero garewa awiya zorogairo ou sere yao awiya Yesura ziye atu yasagaina.
Ayero yenu emo ena atu mitiwa amimene yo iropunu wina-se yewa, “Noeno ou ewiya gera niye?
Nung ou ewiya moni 300 kinana sai zuma gaero pumaya aune nung moni awiya emo bauno bogamasa eno pugai teng yatiya.” Ayero sero awong nung gona yewa.
Ayero yewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Niye bauno dopu. Niye noeno bauno kaputinei? Tani nung na eno yetiya, awiya tani iwaing.

Noeno okowata, emo bauno bogamasa awong niye aune dema nowa narineya. Arare niye awong kora yari sero kotumarineya, awiya nagibo ayao mitariniya. Arata nane mene zo niye aune dema oko nao gege narinena.
Bauno emimene tani nune yaine yao auna teng tani ewiya niya. Ago awong aingso nana mutarineya, arata nung bere-bere buro magayaora ou ewiya aingso nana-una susuniya.
Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Bowi Iwaing tawing sero bautunai aune tani iwaing na eno yetiya auna bowi awiya dema sero sero yaya babariniya ara.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yudas nung Yesu keregari sero emo gitau yaora-una baungna.
Mt 26:14-16;Lu 22:3-6
CHAPTER.VERS: Be aune Yudas Iskeriot, nung buro-mani 12 auna zo, amimene Yesu keregairo gera pugari sero pirisa babuzera-una baungna ara.
Baungnu awong ge nuna nigiro yawa yawa yero nung eno eyero sewa, “Ayero yasa nae moni ena ning eno pugarinenane.” Ayero sewa giro nung Yesu gera pugaora nagibo tamari buro yena.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu nung bonene buro-mani nuna aune dema miniwa.
Mt 26:17-25;Lu 22:7-14, 21-23;Yo 13:21-30
CHAPTER.VERS: Oregao be baina yazo nuna Ame Yis Aung + 14:12 Yuda emo bauno mene dawang sero oregao be baina zo yazo nuna Ame Yis Aung auna atu mitari sero yis iya be 7 semini nasani nauwa. Arare iya namba wan auna atu awong lama dero Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna bonene yero mininauwa. auna iya namba wan aune Yuda emo mene Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna bonene awiya minari sero wo sipsip mani zo dero aero mininauwa. Arare be awiya kasa yenu giro Yesura buro-mani mene nung eno eyero sewa, “Name natu baungno Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna bonene nina kora yanenese kotupunesi?”

Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene buro-mani nuna etobe iyengtiti nasani awongto eno eyero sena, “Nito nape baungnoto emo zo ou aura dungno puro bautuniya awiya tamarineyato ara. Nito nung aune dema babarineyato.
Nung gare towai aune nito garora maung eno eyero seputo, ‘Gipao emo mene ning atata niya. Nung nae buro-mani nuna aune Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna bonene garo moko nauna atu minarinenine?’
Ayero sayato nung garo moko baina zo garo ika tame mitiya awiya nito eno gipariniya. Garo moko awiya masi zuwao au-tao kora yao mitiya. Gipai giro atu nito bonene minaora nona kora yeputo.”
Ayero senu giro buro-mani etobe mene iropuro napo auna baungno nona Yesu mene sena deka ayao ine taungno Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna bonene minaora nona kora yewato ara.
Ture inu Yesu mene buro-mani nuna 12 aune dema kasa yewa.
Awong adungno nona mininasani mitiwa aune Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na ge memoko niye eno sane. Ninae-una zo mene na keregairo iwora waweng pugariniya. Emo na aune dema nona mininiya amimene yariniya.”
Ayero senu awong dubo mininasani nata-nata nung eno eyero sewa, “Nane oko yarinena. Me sinenita?”
Ayero sewa nung awong eno eyero sena, “Niye buro-mani nana 12 auna zo mene yariniya. Emo zo na aune dema ame sura dusariniya amimene yariniya.

Ge gitau gaewa mitoiya ayero na Emora Mani mene magayarinena. Arata emo na Emora Mani keregariniya, nung awiya, oiye, abena nuna nono yao pumariniye? Ai nung oko pumao yatiya, awiya nung meko oko tamatiya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene bonene buro-mani nuna eno pugaina.
Mt 26:26-30;Lu 22:14-20; IKor 11:23-25
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong nona mininasani mitiwa Yesu mene poro puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero eegairo buro-mani nuna eno pugati nasani eyero sena, “Puro minipu. Ewiya goi nana.”
Ayero sero nung awang ou wainne zo puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero awong eno pugainu awong apakana puro miniwa.
Ayero yewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Awiya yu nana. Yu nana mene Tuwa Bayau aune tairo nao auna ge inai tau yariniya. Yu nana emo bauno daigairo eno wosariniya.
Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Na ou wain nupema oko minarinena. Ago Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero naora be kasa yai aune na ou wain seka minarinena.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Petoro mene nung bewae yari nena auna ge sena.
Mt 26:31-35;Lu 22:31-34;Yo 13:36-38
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong yere zo gauno iropuro Yerusalem doro baungno diri yazo Oliwa auna witiro mitiwa
Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Niye apakana na duwarineya. Noeno okowata, ge gayao zo eyero mitiya era, Na Tuwa Bayau mene wo sipsip diya yao emo dana magayai wo sipsip sisi-bura-bura yarineya.
Arata na magayaora atu iropuro Galilaya tawingna babana niye ago barineya.”
Ayero senu Petoro mene nung eno eyero sena, “Awong apakana ning duwarineya, arata na ning oko duwarinena.”
Ayero senu Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Na ge me ning eno sinena era. Nine ping eune kokora mene ge be etobe oko saore na bewae yasa be etama yariniya.”

Ayero sena, arata Petoro mene tauyero ge sena, “Awong na ning aune dema daya magayanese sarineya, arata saineba, na ning oko bewae yarinena.” Petoro mene ayero senu giro awong apakana amimene ge deka ayero sewa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu Gesemani i bure atu isa buro yena.
Mt 26:36-46;Lu 22:39-46
CHAPTER.VERS: Yesu buro-mani nuna aune awong baungno soma zo yazo Gesemani auna kasa yero nung buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Niye etu adungpu. Na isa sarinena.”
Ayero sero nung Petoroto Yakobo aune Yohane awong awiya puro baungno te wawongne nuna ipinenu
nung awong eno eyero sena, “Na dubo minao bainakama tapunena. Dubo minao mene na puro wosi magayanese niya. Niye etu seka mitasani umo neupu.”
Ayero sero nung maingkoka baungno tawingna atu boma gaero isa sinasani yaya nuna-una kasa yari nena awiya nung daigao teng yai giro daigaise sena.
Isa ayero sinasani eyero sena, “O Mama nana, ning tani apakana yao teng niya. Ning yaya ewiya nana-una atu sorero pung. Arata kotumao nana-una okowata, kotumao nina-una teng ye.”
Isa ayero sero kapetegairo buro awong auriti awinasani mitiwa giro nung Petoro eno eyero sena, “Simon, auriti awinesa. Ning be maingkoka gege seka tauyero mitao ine teng oko i?
Etegao mene ninae-una kasa yoiye sero, niye seka mitasani isa sinasani mitipu. Dubo ninae mene buro iwaing yaora eo niya, arata taung mene mou niya.”
Ayero sero nung nupema baungno isa gitau sena deka amaze nupema sena.
Isa sero kapetegairo buro awong diti mou yenu nupema auriti awinasani mitiwa gigina. Giro senu awong no saine yero duwa ara.

Yesu mene nupema baungno isa sero kapetegairo awong auriti awinewa giginu be etama yenu giro awong eno eyero sena, “Niye oregatinasani auriti awineya, amaze sinena! Teng yetiya. Be kasa yetiya. Emora Mani keregeya pasena emora-una waweng wiwitinena.
Keregao emo butuniya. Iropungpu, nunae-una babanene.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yudas mene Yesu puro gorobo emora waweng pugaina.
Mt 26:47-56;Lu 22:47-53;Yo 18:3-12
CHAPTER.VERS: Ayero sinenu buro-mani 12 auna otao nunae Yudas mene iwo dubu baina gitau yero puro buro kasa yewa ara. Pirisa babuzere sao tauyao ge gipao emo aune simai amimene iwo dubu awiya iyengtiwa gorobo yari sero iwire ami-dawangne puro buro kasa yewa ara.
Gitau keregao emo amimene iwo dubu baina aeno ge zo eyero sena, “Emo nane saniro toko yarinena, nung arauwa. Arare niye nung saniro puro babarineya.”
Ge awiya gitau sena, arare nung kasa yero Yesura-una baungno, “Gipao emo,” ayero sero nung toko yena ara.
Ayero yenu giro iwo dubu mene Yesu iniwa ara.
Ayero yewa emo dopero mitiwa auna zo mene iwi nuna geingna atu ininu gururu senu nung pirisa bainana soumani awiya dari yero dawong nuna kesena.
Ayero yenu Yesu mene iwo dubu eno eyero sena, “Niye iwire ami-dawangne puro butuneya, awiya gorobo emo zo puro bunari baine neya.
Be giti awiya na niye aune dema ibu bainana atu ge tugata nasani yero nona niye atu noeno na oko pumao yero nowi? Arata Tuwa Bayaura ge gayao awiya me yaise.”
Ayero senu buro-mani nuna apakana nung doro sungno bamuwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Mani seka zo mene awang yero suna.
CHAPTER.VERS: Mani seka zo mene mo neyang yao zo gege awiro Yesura ame nenu iwo dubu mene nung sanari yewa
nung mo awao nuna yugairo doro aung sungno baungna arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Awong Yesu puro gitau yao dubura benaungna atu gera pugaiwa.
Mt 26:57-68;Lu 22:54-55, 63-71;Yo 18:13-14, 19-24
CHAPTER.VERS: Awong Yesu puro pirisa bainana-una bamuwa pirisa babuze simai ena aune sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena amimene garo auna augaiwa ara.
Ayero newa Petoro mene ake ina atu Yesu ago yero buro pirisa bainana goma auna toiro baungno umo yao emo aune dema adungno iyao ainasani kakame atu mitina ara.

Pirisa babuzere gitau yao dubu apakana awong teng mitasani emo zo mene Yesu eno ge iwao ge sai Yesu gera pugairo daya magayaise sero ge iwao ge ena tamari sero yewa ara. Arata awong pasena nuna zo oko tamuwa.
Emo witao mene Yesu tani yero nauna auna ge ungwe nasani ge iwao ge ena sewa, arata ge iwao ge nunae auna susuwa awiya dekaongka gege oko sewa.
Ena mene dopero ge iwero sero eyero sewa,

“Nae ge nuna nigiwangne. Nung eyero sena, ‘Na Tuwa Bayaura ibu emo bauno mene yewa awiya kasarinena. Kasana wari iya be etama aung yai aune na ibu zo wawong mene yao okowata, ewe zo yarinena.’ Nung ayero senu nigiwangne.” Ayero sewa ara.
Arata awong ayero sinasani ge nunae auna susuwa awiya dekaongka gege oko sero yewa.
Pirisa baina mene nunae-una towang atu dopero Yesu eno eyero sena, “Ning nono yero ge nina sineya auna abena oko sao ge aung mitesi?”

Ayero sena ara, arata Yesu mene ge auna abena oko sao teba dopero mitina ara. Ayero yenu pirisa baina mene nupema atata yero sena, “Ning Yuda emo baunona Emo Tuwa yazo Kristo Tuwa Bayaura Mani meta aung i?”
Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na Kristo. Niye na Emora Mani awiya Tuwa Bayau Putoungne auna wawong mera atu adungno mitana garineya. Na uritira berezere dema butunana garineya.”

Ayero senu pirisa baina mene Yesu nung Tuwa Bayaura yazo dena-betena yenu siya sero taung wori nuka nuna ininu kerenu eyero sena, “Name noeno emo ena buro nung gera pugaese sari nenine? Nung nutope kara gera pugaiya.
Niye ge meko nuna nigiro no sarinei?” Ayero senu awong sewa, “Pasena nuna meko, arare daya magayaise.”

Ayero sewa ena mene begura pise nuna-una tame gairo diti moko nuna worero wawong mene dero aune eyero sewa, “Emo awe mene ning detiye, auna yazo nuna keregai ganene.” Ayero sewa nung bunero puro mitiwa amimene nung sowena yanakana dewa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Petoro mene Yesu bewae yena.
Mt 26:69-75;Lu 22:56-62;Yo 18:15-18, 25-27
CHAPTER.VERS: Petoro mene wese kakame atu adungno mitinu pirisa bainana soumani baunodi zo mene buro Petoro iyao ainasani mitinu
giro nung anuwing nasani eyero sena, “Ning dema Yesu Nasaretera emo aune dema nosa.”
Ayero senu nung eyero sena, “Na oko gao. Ning ge sinesa awiya na oko gosinena.” Ayero sero nung goma bera baungnu kokora zo mene ge sena ara.
Petoro atu baungnu soumani baunodi deka amimene nung giro emo atu mitiwa aeno nupema sena, “Emo ewiya dubu nuna auna zo.”

Ayero senu Petoro mene nupema bewae yero“ Aung arauwa,” ayero sena ara. Be maingkoka aung yenu aune emo atu mitiwa amimene Petoro eno eyero sewa, “Ge me sinenane ara. Ning dubu nuna auna zo arauwa. Noeno okowata, ning dema ning Galilaya emo zo.”
Ayero sewa nung nupema Tuwa Bayaura benaungna ge eyero senu tau yena, “Na ge iwarinena, awiya Tuwa Bayau mene na dai magayarinena. Niye emo yazo sineya awiya na oko gosinena.”
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Awong Yesu puro Pilatora-una bamuwa.
Mt 27:1-2, 11-14;Lu 23:1-5;Yo 18:28-38
CHAPTER.VERS: Ayero senu kokora mena ge be etobe sena ara. Kokora ge senu Petoro mene Yesura ge kotuna. Yesu mene gitau Petoro eno eyero sena, “Nine kokora ge be etobe oko saore na bewae yasa be etama yariniya.” Yesu mene gitau ayero sena, awiya nuka nutope kotungno zi baina sena arauwa.

Iya gati nenu pirisa babuze aune simaire sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena aune gitau yao dubu apakana awong amimene augairo ge teng sero Yesura wawong etobe bunero puro Pilatora-una bamuwa. + 15:1 Soremao Ge zoYohane 18:31-32 auna atu mitiya awiya gi.
Puro bamuwa Pilato mene nung atata yero eyero sena, “Ning Yuda emora emo tuwa i?” Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Yore, sinesa ara.” Ayero sena ara.
Awong Yesura ge buro newa pirisa babuze mene ge iwi nasani Yesu nung tani meko witao yero nasani nauna ayero sewa.
Ayero sewa Pilato mene nung nupema atata yero sena, “Ning ge abena saine yao teng oko i? Awong tani meko nina auna susuwa witao keregatineya, gosinesa.”
Ayero sena, arata Yesu mene ge zo oko sao yenu giro Pilato mene kotungno wawong di gauna ara.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Pilato mene Yesu i pasaora daese sena.
Mt 27:15-26;Lu 23:13-25;Yo 18:39—19:16
CHAPTER.VERS: Dawang sero bonene yaora be kasa naunu Yuda emo mene bunao mani zo eno sinauwa giro Pilato mene mani awiya besinauna.
Arare emo zo yazo nuna Barabas amimene emo enane dema bunao gare mitina ara. Awong gavman dari sero winade yero emo ena dewa magayewa, arare awong bunao gare mitiwa.
Arare emo dubu bainane mene Pilatora-una kasa yero eyero sewa, “Ning dawang sero tani zo nae eno yero nosa awiya nupema ye.”
Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Na Yuda emora emo tuwa besero niye eno puganese kotupuneita?”
Pilato mene pirisa babuze awong tini kapaore Yesu teba puro baungno nuna-una pugaiwa awiya kotungno aune ayero sena ara.
Arata pirisa babuze mene emo dubu baina aeno eyero sewa, “Nung Yesu okowata, Barabas maze besaise sepu.” Emo dubu baina amimene ayero saese sewa tau yenu giro ge dekaongka awiya sewa ara.
Ayero sewa Pilato mene nigiro awong eno nupema eyero sena, “Ayero saya aune emo nika ninae nung maze Yuda emora emo tuwa asinowa, nung awiya puro nono yanese sinei?”
Ayero senu awong wawa sero nung eno eyero sewa, “I pasaora magayaise.”
Ayero sewa Pilato mene abena awong eno eyero sena, “Noeno ayero sinei? Nung pasena no yeni?” Ayero sena, arata awong be kerero wawa sero nupema eyero sewa, “I pasaora magayaise.”

Ayero sewa giro Pilato mene emo bauno dubo iwaing yaise sero senu gorobo emo mene Barabas besewa kasa yenu awong Yesu angsi wo aingso mene yao + 15:15 Soremao Ge zoMatiu 27:26 auna atu mitiya awiya gi. amimene wezewa ara. Wezi nete duwa aune Pilato mene Yesu i pasaora daya magayaise sero gorobo emora-una waweng pugaina arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Gorobo emo mene Yesu izewa.
Mt 27:27-31;Yo 19:2-3
CHAPTER.VERS: Romana emo tuwara gorobo emo ena mene Yesu puro Romana emo tuwara gare witiro sewa gorobo emo apakana nuna-una augaiwa.
Augairo taung wori yuyao ine nung eno wosogairo angsi dungne puro ewero aune ziyo nuna-una atu wosogaiwa ara.
Ayero yero nung izinasani emo tuwa arugaine nasani eyero sewa, “Wari iwaing, Yuda emora emo tuwa.”
Ayero sero ziyo nuna waung mene dedunasani begura nuna tame pisinasani koing gairo nung bowi yaora etotoma yewa ara.
Awong nung izinete taung wori yuyao ine awiya dutugairo doro taung wori nuna nupema wosogaiwa punu i pasaora dari sero puro bamuwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Awong Yesu i pasaora dewa.
Mt 27:32-44;Lu 23:26-43;Yo 19:17-27
CHAPTER.VERS: Emo zo yazo nuna Simon, tawing nuna Sairini, nung Alesandato Rufasra maung, nung towang zora atu buro Yerusalem babari sero butunenu awong nung taungno ge tauyao nung eno eyero sewa, “Ning emo euna i pasao ewiya diung.”
Ayero sero awong Yesu puro baung tawing yazo Goligata auna yewa ara. Tawing auna yazo awiya susuwa nuna eyao era, “Gitau atora wetu.”
Awong ou wain puro dubo dau yaora ou zo yazo mira aune dema dawero nung eno pugaiwa, arata nung oko minao yangduna.
Awong nung i pasaora atu niri mene dewa. Dero aune mo nuna bono yari sero awemene mo zo pariniye, asero getuwao zo yazo nuna laki awiya yero mo nuna bono yewa ara.
Awong nung dewa awiya wari diti 9 kilok nenu aune nung i pasaora atu dewa ara.
Ayero ziyo gomina ika atu susuwa noeno nung dewi auna ge eyero gaero pugaiwa mitina, “Yuda emora emo tuwa.”
Be aune awong ugaing yao mani etobe dema i pasao nunato-una dero Yesura-una zo enaba zo enaba yero pugaiwa dopewato ara.
[Ayero yewa Tuwa Bayaura ge gitau gaewa awiya me yena. Ge awiya eyero mitiya era, Awong nung gigiwa pasena emo ine yenu giro nung pasena emore dema pugaiwa ara. Ge awiya gitau gaewa amimene me yena.]
Emo bauno mene puma-sauma nasani nung izero nung eno eyero sewa, “Wae, ning emo ibu baina kasero wari be etama gege ibu seka yero aung yari sasa.
Ning nika nitope taung aingso nina gera yaora atu sorero i pasaora atu wosi dopase.” Ayero sewa ara.
Deka ayero pirisa babuzere sao tauyao ge gipao emo enane mene Yesu izinasani wina-se yewa, “Nung gitau emo ena soreuno kora yero nauna, arata nung nuka nutope soremao ine teng oko.

Kristo nung Isreli emora emo tuwa naname noiya amimene yeme i pasora atu wosaise. Wosai giro, ‘Me sena,’ asarinenane.” Ayero wina-se yewa ara. Emo etobe i pasaora mitiwato amimene dema nung izewato arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu magayena.
Mt 27:45-56;Lu 23:44-49;Yo 19:28-30
CHAPTER.VERS: Wari diti 12 kilok yenu mume baina kasa yero tawing teng yero mitinu 3 kilok yenu
aune Yesu mene be kerero eyero sena, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani.” Ge auna susuwa eyao era, “Tuwa Bayau nana, Tuwa Bayau nana, ning noeno na dotinesi?”
Ayero senu emo ena nugu mitiwa amimene ge awiya nigiro eyero sewa, “Gipu. Nung Eliya yau siniya.”

Ayero sewa giro mani zo mene sungno baungno witora yabutata zo ou wain dokowang yaora dusero itura diro Yesu mene minaise sero nung eno pugairo eyero sena, “Name nung Eliya mene buro i pasaora atu parinita, awiya garinenane.”
Ayero senu Yesu mene nupema aiyamama sero magayena ara.
Magayenu ibu bainana mo bainakama + 15:38 Soremao Ge zoMatiu 27:51 auna atu mitiya awiya gi. kimegao awiya ika atu zayero kerero dao etobe yena ara.
Gorobo emo 100 auna gitau yao mene Yesu anuwing nasani mitinu Yesu magayenu giro eyero sena, “Emo ewiya nung Tuwa Bayaura mani me.” Ayero sena ara.
Bauno ena dema mitiwa. Awong ake ina atu dopero anuwing nasani mitiwa ara. Enana yazo nunae Maria napo nuna Madala, aune Maria zo nung Yakoboto Yosera ai, aune bauno zo yazo nuna Salome.

Gitau Yesu Galilaya tawingna atu nasani nauna be aune bauno amimene nung ago nasani nona nuna sasinasani nauwa ara. Aune bauno witao Yesu aune dema Yerusalem atu buro kasa yewa amimene awong aune dema atu dopero mitiwa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Awong Yesura aingso puro daba-umana pugaiwa.
Mt 27:57-61;Lu 23:50-56;Yo 19:38-42
CHAPTER.VERS: Arimatia napora emo zo yazo nuna Yosefe, nung Yudara gitau yao dubu auna emo zo yazore ara. Nung dema Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna be diya nasani nauna. Arare nung amimene ture itinenu be bonene korayaora be kasa yenu awiro gora awiya Sabat iya dang giro nung tauyero Pilatora-una baungno Yesura aingso pumari sena ara.
Yesura aingso pumari senu giro Pilato mene, nung magayetita, asero gorobo emo 100 auna gitau yao yau senu bunu eyero sena, “Yesu magayetita?” Ayero senu gitau yao mene eyero sena, “Nung magayetiya.”
Ayero senu giro Pilato mene Yosefe baungno Yesura aingso pumaise sena.

Senu Yosefe mene baungno mo neyang yao iwaing zo zuma gaero puro baungno Yesura aingso i pasaora atu batagairo puro mo amimene ewero puro baungno daba-uma wamao auna pugaina. Atu pugairo daba zo dereme yenu baungno daba-umana be awiya gazena ara.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu nupema iropuna.
Mt 28:1-8;Lu 24:1-12;Yo 20: 1-10
CHAPTER.VERS: Ayero yenu Maria etobe, zo napo nuna Madala, zo nung Yosera ai, amimene daba-umana atu aingso nuna pugaiwa awiya gigiwato arauwa.
Sabat iya dang be aung yenu Maria napo nuna Madala auneto Maria nung Yakobora ai, awongto aune bauno Salome amimene baungno ou sereyao Yesura aingso tame yasagari sero zuma gaero pumuwa ara.
Arare wikira be namba wan yazo nuna Sande awiya kasa yenu iya gainu awong iya oko gao biriti be nuna-una bamuwa ara.
Awong bautunasani nuka nuyetope eyero wina-se yewa, “Awe mene daba zo uma be gazao awiya name eno dereme yero enaba pugariniye?”
Ayero sewa, noeno okowata, daba awiya bainakama. Ayero sero diti gitau yero daba baina awiya uma be doro enaba atu mitina awiya gigiwa.
Giro daba-umana toiro mani taung seka zo wawong mera atu adungno mitina awiya gigiwa. Mani auna mo neyang yao awiya imoko-kaungkaung. Bauno mene nung giro yangka sewa.

Ayero yewa mani amimene awong eno eyero sena, “Niye awang yao dopu. Niye Yesu Nasaretera emo deteya magatiya awiya gari sero butuneya. Nung iropumiya. Nung etu oko mitiya. Masi aingso nuna pugeya awiya era gipu.

Ayero niye baungpu, buro-mani nuna ena eno sinasani Petoro eno dema eyero sepu nigae, ‘Nung Galilaya tawingna gitau bautuniya. Arare niye baungno nung atu garineya ara. Ge deka awiya gitau mena niye eno sena.’ Ayero sepu nigae.”
Ayero senu awong daba-uma doro sungno bamuwa. Noeno okowata, te wawongne awena ipinenu awong awang yewa. Arare awong awang nasani ge awiya emo zo eno oko sao yewa arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Maria napo nuna Madala amimene Yesu gigina.
Mt 28:9-10;Yo 20:11-18
CHAPTER.VERS: [Yesu mene wikira be namba wan yazo Sande aune gora-gara iropuro nuka nutope gitau Maria napo Madala auna-una kasa yenu gigina ara. Gitau Yesu mene iwae 7 Mariara-una atu tunena.
Bauno amimene baungno Yesura dubu zi sinasani zibe nasani mitiwa aeno eyero sena, “Na nung gigena.”
Ayero senu awong bauno mene Yesu seka yero iropunu gigina auna ge sena awiya nigiwa me oko yena.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesura buro-mani etobe mene Emeas nagibe atu Yesu tamuwato.
CHAPTER.VERS: Ago Yesu mene benaung ewe yero emo etobe nagibe atu bautunewato towang atu nuka nutope nunato-una kasa yenu gigiwato.
Nung awongto aune dema nenu nung gigiwato kasa yenu giro awongto nupema tera kapete Yerusalem gairo baungno Yesura dubu ena eno sewato, arata awong ge nunato nigiwa me oko yao yena.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Yesu mene buro-mani nuna burora pugaina.
Mt 28:16-20;Lu 24:36-49;Yo 20:19-23;Apo 1:6-8
CHAPTER.VERS: Ago nung buro-mani nuna 11 amimene nona mininasani mitiwa aune nuka nutope nunae-una atu kasa yenu gigiwa. Emo bauno ena mene Yesu iropunu gigiwa auna ge sewa nigiwa me oko yao yena aeno nung awong gona yena.
Nung awong eno eyero sena, “Niye tere-taira yero tawing sero baungno Bowi Iwaing emo bauno apakana eno sepu nigae.

Zo nung Bowi Iwaing nigiro na tumo diro ge ou suwariniya, nung awiya Tuwa Bayau mene sorero pumariniya. Arata zo nung Bowi Iwaing nana nigiro na tumo oko diyao yariniya, nung awiya Tuwa Bayau mene gera pugai zuwariniya ara.
Emo na tumo diyarineya amimene tani putoungne eyao ine yarineya: Awong iwae be nana-una tunarineya; awong ge ewe-pape gitau oko nigao awiya sarineya;

awong yi mani gamao awiya iniro oko meko yarineya; awong ou meko miniro magayao awiya minarineya, arata awong yaya oko tamarineya; awong wawong nunae emo bauno yayare auna tame pugaya iwaing yarineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Tuwa Bayau mene Yesu puro pu uritira gaina.
Lu 24:50-53;Apo 1:9-11
CHAPTER.VERS: Tuwa Yesu mene buro-mani nuna eno ge senu aung yenu Tuwa Bayau mene nung puro witiro pu uritira gainu nung Tuwa Bayaura wawong mera aduna ara.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: BOWI IWAING LUKA MENE GAENA
Luka mene Yesura ungwe ewiya emo Teofilo eno gaena ara.
CHAPTER.VERS: Ayero yenu awong tere-taira yero Bowi Iwaing soma apakana auna atu sinauwa. Ayero yero yewa Tuwa mene ge nunae soremai tau yaise sero awong sorepu naunu tani putoungne yero nasani nauwa arauwa.]\id LUK NT. LK ZIA WILSON/PHANUEL TFR L DP-DEC 28-MAY-86\h LUK\mt BOWI IWAING LUKA MENE GAENA\ip\ it Luka nung dokta zo. Nung Paulo aune dema nasani nauna. Nung Yuda emo oko, arare nung Yesura ungwe ewiya Grik emo eno gaena. Grik emo awong etutero naoawiya aratapu nasani nauwa, arare Luka mene Yesura ungwe gainasani Yesu nungetutero nao emo me auna ungwe-maungwe yena. Yesu nung emo bauno eno yo-amaobainane nasani nauna, awiya Luka mene keregaina. Luka nung APOSOLO BURO YERONASANI NAUWA auna ge dema gaena.\it*
Ungwe awiya emo ena awong tani awiya diti moko nunae mene zayaora atugiro butu nasani nauwa amimene Bowi Iwaingna buro-mani yero nasani tugatayero nauwa nigiti nasani naungwane ara.
Arare nane ungwe gaewa deka ayao ine maze ning eno gaero baingtarikotupunena. Noeno okowata, na tani auna susuwa nigiro baingtari sero atatadaigairo yero nawe tamuwang.
Arare ge ning eno gipewa auna ge me susuware awiya gasa memoko yaise seroungwe awiya gayari sero nena.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Angelo mene Yohane kasa yari nena auna ge Zekaraya eno sena.
CHAPTER.VERS: Be Herode mene Yuda emora emo tuwa yero nasani nauna be aune pirisa zoyazo nuna Zekaraya amimene nasani nauna. Nung awiya pirisa dubu yazo Abaisaauna zo. Bauno nuna awiya Aronna dubu auna zo. Yazo nuna Elisabet.

Awongto Tuwa Bayaura ditira atu iwaing nasani nauwato ara. Awongto Tuwarasao tauyao ge awiya teng ago nasani nauwato ara. Anasani Tuwa Bayaura geteng dipunasani nauwato ara. Nunato-una mouyao zo aung.
Arata awongto mani aung. Noeno okowata, Elisabet nung wagaung. Nupemaawongto zai yewato.
Zekarayara dubu awong buro yaora be nunae kasa yenu giro Zekaraya nungTuwa Bayaura benaungna pirisa buro nenu
awong nung zawing sereyao pugao auna buro yaise sewa ibu moko iwaingpirisa mene Tuwa Bayau eno zawing pugati nauwa auna toina ara.
Be zawing pugaora bera atu emo bauno dubu baina amimene masi daung aunaatu augairo isa sinasani mitiwa.
Ayero newa aune Zekaraya nung Tuwa Bayaura angelo zo zawing pugaora aitaauna deung wawong mera ina atu dopero mitinu gigina ara.
Nung angelo giro yangka sero awang yena ara.
Arata angelo mene nung eno eyero sena, “Zekaraya, ning awang oko yase. Tuwa Bayau mene isa nina nigitinoiya. Bauno nina Elisabet mani nina emodipumai ning yazo nuna Yohane ayause.
Ayero ning dubo nina iwaing mitai yawa yawa yase. Nung kasa yai emobauno daigairo amimene dema yawa yawa yarineya.

Nung awiya Tuwara benaungna atu emo baina yariniya. Arata nung ou wainoko minariniya. Aune ou tau-tataware yao dema oko minariniya. Be nung airatiyangna mitai aune Oweno mene moko nuna topetiro bebariniya.
Nung Isreli emo bauno daigairo yumai kapetegairo baung Tuwa nunae TuwaBayaura-una yero narineya.

Nung Eliya ine yero tani nuna aune putoung nuna awiya puro nariniya. Ayero Tuwara nagibo gitau yariniya. Nung mamonona kotumao inai darawa yeromani mamani nunae kotumarineya. Nung ge dao emo awiya kora yai kotumaoiwaing tamarineya. Ayero emo kora yai Tuwa bariniya awiya diya mitarineya.”
Angelo ayero senu Zekaraya mene angelo eno eyero sena, “Na nono yero geawiya nigiro me sarineni? Na mena zai tena. Bauno nana deka ayero zaitiyare.”
Ayero senu angelo mene ge abena kapetegairo eyero sena, “Na Gebriel. NaTuwa Bayaura benaungna dodopinona amimene Tuwa Bayau mene na ge iwaing ewiyaning eno sanese sesi giro buro sinena.
Arare sana nigi. Ning ge nana nigesa me oko yao niya, aeno ewawa ninatauyaise. Ayero yai ning ge sao titiyero nasa ge nana euna me kasa yai aunege nupema sarinesa.” Angelo mene ayero sena ara.
Emo bauno awong Zekaraya diya yewa mena oko kasa yao yenu giro kotumaogayang-gayang pupunasani eyero sewa, “No kasa yeti nung ibu moko dang aunaatu nimoi-namoi mitiye?”

Ago nung kasa daung yero aune awong eno ge saine yao teng oko yena ara. Ayenu awong nung moko dang auna atu nona putoungne zo tauna awiya gigiwakasa yena ara. Nung ge awong eno sao awiya wawong mene gege etotoma yenaara. Noeno oko ewawa nuna tauyaore.
Ago Zekaraya nung buro nuna aung yenu doro napo nuna-una baungna.
Ayenu ago bauno nuna Elisabet nung mesa yena ara. Mesa yero ino wawongzo awiya nung pungyero mitauna ara. Nung eyero sena,
“Tuwa mene na yo-auno giro na eno eyero yetiya ara. Awiya na wagaungnona aeno meng gao nana ewiya emo baunona benaungna atu disanese seroyetiya.” Ayero sena ara.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Angelo mene Yesu mani kasa yaise Maria eno sena.
CHAPTER.VERS: Elisabet nung mesa yenu ino 6 aung yenu aune Tuwa Bayau mene senu angeloGebriel mene napo baina zo Galilaya tawingna mitauna yazo nuna Nasarete aunabaungna.
Napo auna mani baunodi zo yazo nuna Maria, nung emo zo yazo nuna Yosefe, nung Dawidira saisibuna auna zo, awiya ataise sero gerewa nasani nauna.
Arare Gebriel mene nuna-una baungno eyero sena, “Ture iwaing. TuwaBayau ning gosinoi iwaing yero noiya. Tuwa mene ning aune dema mitoiya.”
Ayero senu Maria nung ge awiya nigiro kotumao nuna mou-mesa yena ara. Dubo nuna mene kotungno, “ge nomaze siniye?” asena ara.
Ayero yenu angelo mene nung eno eyero sena, “Maria, ning oko awangyase. Tuwa Bayau mene ning gigi iwaing niya.
Sana nigi. Ning mesa yero mani emodi zo puro yazo nuna Yesu yausarinesa.
Nung emo baina yero nariniya. Nung Tuwa Bayau ika mitoiya auna Manimemoko asarineya ara. Tuwa Bayau mene nung emo tuwa pugai ewowo nuna Dawidiine yero mitariniya.
Nung amimene Yakobora saisibuna auna emo tuwa yero be giti mitao gegemitariniya. Emo tuwa yero naora buro nuna awiya oko aung yariniya.”
Angelo ayero senu Maria mene angelo eno eyero sena, “Tani ayao awiyanono yero kasa yariniye? Na emo zo oko ataoware.”

Ayero senu angelo mene ge nuna abena kapetegairo eyero sena, “Owenomene nina-una kasa yariniya. Ayero Tuwa Bayau ika mitoiya auna putoung nunamene ning worariniya. Aeno mani pumarinesa awiya awong nung eno eyerosarineya, ‘Nung dang. Nung Tuwa Bayaura Mani.’

Sana nigi. Ai nina maingkoka Elisabet nung zai, arata nung mesa yeroniya. Mani emodi otira mitiya. Gitau awong nung eno eyero sinauwa, ‘Nungmani pao ine teng oko.’ Arata yeme nung mesa yeti ino 6 aung yetiya.
Nona zo nomaze Tuwa Bayau mene yao ine teng oko awiya oko mitiya.”
Ayero senu Maria mene eyero sena, “Na Tuwara buro bauno, arare sinesaayero yaise.” Ayero senu angelo doro baungna arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Maria baungno Elisabet gigina.
CHAPTER.VERS: Be aune Maria nuka nutope iropuro wongto-wongto yero Yudaya tawingnabaungno napo zo diri atu mitauna auna baungna.
Atu baungno Zekarayara garo mokora toiro Elisabet arugaina.
Ayero yenu Elisabet nung Mariara arugao nigitinenu Elisabetra mani otiramitina awiya wurugu-warugu yena. Ayero yenu Oweno mene Elisabetra moko bebuna ara.
Ayenu nung yau sinasani eyero sena, “Ning gao bainane. Gao nina menebauno enana gao daigatiniya. Mani nina-una otira mitiya a deka dema gaoreara.
Naka iwaing ungta ning Tuwa nana-una ai amimene nana-una butunesi?
Dawong nana mene arugao nina nigitinena aune nana-una otira mani mitiyaamimene yawa yawa yero wurugu-warugu yetiya.
Tuwa mene ning eno sena auna me awiya ago kasa yariniya asinosa, ararening yawa yawa yero nasani nosa.” Elisabet mene ayero sena arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Mariara yere.
CHAPTER.VERS: Maria nung eyero sena, “Na moko nana mene Tuwara yazo puro wiwitinona.
Ititi nana yawa yawa Tuwa Bayau Sorao Emo nana eno niya.
Noeno okowata, nung na buro baunodi nuna wosao ewiya kotungna. Arareyemeta ago awiya emo bauno apakana amimene na eno eyero sarineya, ‘TuwaBayau mene bauno awiya gao yenu yawa yawa baina yena.’
Gaya ayao yariniya, noeno okowata, Tuwa Bayau putoung bainane mene naeno nona baina yena. Yazo nuna dang mitoiya amimene yena.
Ara tamao nuna awiya emo nuna wosao miteya auna-una mitoiya. Deka ayerosaisibunana-una atu wisika sero babao gege bautunasani mitariniya.
Nung wawong nuna mene buro tau-tataware yao yariniya. Taung puro witaoemo kotumao nunae paso didinowa, awong awiya tunai tere-taira yerozanarineya.
Tuwa Bayau mene emo tuwa tau-tataware yao auna putoung nunae puro wowosinasani emo wosao awiya puro witariniya.
Nung emo bogamasa eno nona iwawaing pugariniya. Ayero emo wau-moniwitaore awong tunai wawong usa yero tebeba babarineya.
Nung soremao nuna mitoiya auna gege buro-mani nuna Isreli dubu sorepu nasani nariniya.
Ayero nasani nung ewowo nanae eno sena awiya teng yariniya. AwiyaAbraham aune saisibuna nuna eno sena ara.”
Maria mene Elisabet aune mitete dunu ino etama aung yenu aune nung doronapo nuna-una baungna arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Elisabet mene Yohane puna.
CHAPTER.VERS: Mani pumaora be bunu Elisabet mene mani emodi puna.
Napo dema nuna arita didikaing nuna bowi nigiwa Tuwa mene nung soreunugiro awong teng deka ayero nung aune dema yawa yawa yewa.
Nung mani punu wari be 8 aung yenu aune awong maingna taung aingsokapari augaiwa ara. Anasani aune awong maung nuna Zekarayara yazo yau sarisewa,
arata maingna ai mene“ Aungwa” sero eyero sena, “Name yazo nunaYohane yau sarinenane.”
Ayero senu awong nung eno eyero sewa, “Imoo mani nina-una yazo ayao zoaung ara.”
Awong wawong mene etotoma yero maung atata yewa, “Ning yazo awe mazeyau sari kotupunesi?”
Ayero sewa nung tape zo puro bumaese yenu giro puro bumuwa eyero gaena,“Yazo nuna Yohane.” Ayero gaenu awong kotumao daigairo pumuwa ara.
Ayero newa be aune ewawa nuna tauyena mitauna amimene nupema ge senaara. Nung ge sinasani Tuwa Bayau bowi yena.
Ayenu napo dema nuna awong apakana awang yewa. Arare maingna bowi meneYudaya tawingna diri auna napo sero sero baungno aung yena ara.
Emo bauno daigairo amimene bowi awiya nigiro pu dube gaiwa ara. Ayeroaune eyero sewa, “Ago mani amimene nono yero nariniye?” Awong gigiwaTuwara putoung nung aune dema mitina arauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Zekarayara yere.
CHAPTER.VERS: Oweno mene maung nuna Zekarayara-una atu bebunu nung porofete mene sainenasani eyero sena,
“Name Isrelira Tuwa Bayau auna yazo nuna puro witanene. Nung buro nameemo bauno nuna soreuno zuma gayariniya.
Buro-mani nuna Dawidi auna dubura atu Sorao Emo tau-tataware yao zonaname-una towang pugatiniya.
Nung ayero yari sero gitau otu porofete pewa yetugao nuna eno senu awongbe nunae mene keregaiwa.
Nung eyero yari sero keregaina: Nung name iwora waweng atu soreropumariniya. Anasani nung name emo kotumao memeko name eno pupunowa aunawaweng atu dema sorero pumariniya ara.
Nung ewowo naname soremari sena. Nung tairo naora ge sena awiyakotupunasani giro ayero yari sena.
Tairo nao ge awiya ewowo naname Abraham eno sena. Arare nung tairo naorage sinasani eyero yari sena:

Nung name iwora waweng atu sorariniya. Ayero yai name be narinenaneauna teng awang yao aung nuna benaungna atu nasani be giti nao iwaing nasanitani pewa yero nao aune tani iwaing gege nasani aune nung sou nasaninarinenane.
Orata mani nana, nine zo emo mene ning eno Tuwa Bayau ika mitoiya aunaporofete asariniya. Ning awiya Tuwara nagibo kora yari sero gitau yarinesa.
Nine emo bauno nuna tugata yasa awong eyero garineya: Nung pasena nunaedisero awong sorero pumariniya.
Awiya Tuwa Bayau naname mene mono pumao nuna-una teng ayero yariniya. Nung emo zo uritira wari ine awiya pugai naname-una bumariniya.
Nung buro emo bauno awong magayao awang nasani mumena atu mitima nowaauna atu waegariniya. Nung name dubo iwaingne naora nagibora pugariniya.” Zekaraya mene ayero sero aung yena ara.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Maria mene Yesu puna.
CHAPTER.VERS: Mani Yohane awiya kasa yero bairo bainakama yenu kotumao nuna zawagairoiwaing yena ara. Ayero yenu nung Isreli dubura benaungna kasa yao auna benuna diya nasani tawing zo emo aung auna atu baungno nasani nauna arauwa.
Awiya zayero mena yazo gaewa ara. Arare Sairinias nung Siria tawingna emotuwa yero mitauna be aune yazo gaewa ara.
Arare be awiya emo bauno apakana ayero awong yazo nunae gayari naposusuwa nunae-una bamuwa ara.
Yosefe nung Dawidira saisibuna auna zo, arare nung Galilaya tawingna napoNasarete awiya doro baung Yudaya tawingna yero Dawidira napo yazo Betelehemasinauwa auna baungna.
Nung bauno gerao nuna Mariato dema babayato yazo nunato gayaese serobamuwato ara. Maria nung moure nasani aune baungna ara.
Awongto napo auna atu mitiwato Maria mani pumaora be nuna kasa yena.
Arata garo esewara awiya emo bauno mene puro aung yero mitiwa. Arare nungmani nuna emodi muwo mani awiya puro mo mene dowero pu bulimakao teparagainu mitina.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Angelo mene Yesura bowi wo sipsip diya yao emo eno sewa.
CHAPTER.VERS: Napo auna bautara atu emo ena wo sipsip nunae pingne diya newa,
Tuwara angelo zo mene nunae-una kasa yenu Tuwara waegao baina amimenenunae una atu waegainu awong giro awang yewa ara.
Arata angelo mene awong eno eyero sena, “Niye awang oko yae. Sananigipu. Na Bowi Iwaing puro ninae-ina butunena. Bowi awiya emo bauno apakanaamimene nigiro yawa yawa bainakama yarineya.
Be eune Dawidira nape atu bauno zo mani pumiya. Mani amimene niye mekoraatu sorero pumariniya. Nung awiya Tuwa ninae Kristo ara.
Niye nung eyero gaya kasa yariniya: Niye mani zo garineya, awiya mo menedowao. Nung bulimakao tepara atu apegairo mitiya.”
Angelo nung ayero sinenu uritira angelo dubu daigairo awong mena kasayero nung aune dema Tuwa Bayaura yazo de ika nasani eyero sewa,
“Uritira atu Tuwa Bayaura yazo baina yaise. Tawingna atu emo bauno TuwaBayau mene gosinoi iwaing yero nowa auna atu mono kasa niya.” Ayero sewaarauwa.
CHAPTER.CAPTION: Wo diya yao emo awong baungno Yesu gigiwa.
CHAPTER.VERS: Angelo dubu awong doro kapete gairo baung uritira newa wo sipsip diyayao emo awong eyero sewa, “Name Betelehem nape baungno nona kasa yeti Tuwamene name eno gipetiya awiya ganene.”
Ayero sero awong kapetegairo baungno Mariato Yosefe mitiwato awiya giromani wuire bulimakao tepara atu apegairo mitinu gigiwa ara.
Awong mani giro mani wuire auna ge nigiwa awiya keregairo sewa ara.
Ge awiya keregairo sewa emo apakana wo sipsip diya yao emora ge awiyanigiro kotumao daigairo pumuwa ara.
Arata Maria nung ge apakana awiya dubo nuna-una pugainu mitaunu nungkotupunasani nauna ara.
Wo diya yao emo awong kapetegairo baungno Tuwa Bayau bowi nasani yazonuna de ika yewa. Noeno okowata, angelo mene ge senu nigiwa awiya tengmaingna-una atu gigiwa arauwa.
